Development Director at SafeStart International
Manchester
Summary
A highly experienced consultant and account/business development
manager, I have focussed on sustainability based consulting and
learning and development projects since 2007. Particular experience
and expertise in Behavioural Safety, Culture Change Programmes
and Learning and Development solutions.
Extensive global business development and project delivery
experience.
Expert in delivering bespoke and standardised solutions to a
wide variety of companies from small private companies to global
giants. I have worked across a variety of industries;- Oil and Gas,
Manufacturing, Transport and Logistics, Food, Retail and Public
Sector to name a few.
Specialities: Sustainability Consultancy, Behavioural Safety and
Culture Change Programmes, Learning and Development and e-
Learning.
Experience
SafeStart International
Development Director
September 2017 - Present  (3 years 6 months)
Manchester, Greater Manchester, United Kingdom
DuPont Sustainable Solutions
5 years 9 months
Senior Account Manager
June 2016 - September 2017  (1 year 4 months)
Manchester, Greater Manchester, United Kingdom
Business Development Manager
January 2012 - June 2016  (4 years 6 months)
  Page 1 of 2
   
Responsible for the Learning and Development practice within DuPont
Sustainable Solutions in The UK and Ireland.
DuPont Sustainable Solutions offer consultancy for Safety, Productivity,
Environmental and other broad reach Sustainability initiatives.
DuPont Training Solutions
Key Account Manager
May 2007 - January 2012  (4 years 9 months)
UK, Ireland, Nordics and Sub Saharan Africa
Initially responsible for launching the Coastal Training Technologies suite of
Learning and Development solutions to the UK market. Responsible for sales
and marketing, project management and project delivery.
Subsequent to the take over by DuPont Sustainable Solutions, I became
responsible for The Nordics and Sub-Saharan Africa in addition to the UK,
leading an internal and field based sales team.
Working with a variety of clients on project based training initiatives utilising
tools such as The STOP(TM) Programme, SafeStart(R) and the Claritynet
eLearning System.
  Page 2 of 2

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
